description.@en: When armed with a heavy weapon, you can deliver crushing blows that splinter shields and shatter weapons.

effect.@en: If you roll a Critical Success with a Melee Attack, you inflict the Ruined! Quality to a foeâ€™s shield, weapon or armor (your choice). Overwhelming Force has no effect on Castle-forged trappings, and you must be armed with a twohanded melee weapon.
